CustomField.formula: IF ( ISPICKVAL(blng__Status__c, 'Completed with Errors'), IMAGE('/resource/blng__blng_slds/assets/images/InvoiceRun_StatusRed.png', 'In Progress', 20, 20), IF ( ISPICKVAL(blng__Status__c, 'Completed'), IMAGE('/resource/blng__blng_slds/assets/images/InvoiceRun_StatusGreen.png', 'In Progress', 20, 20), IMAGE('/resource/blng__blng_slds/assets/images/InvoiceRun_StatusOrange.png', 'In Progress', 20, 20)))
CustomField.label: Status Indicator
